item.title: Just got outed by my classmates.
item.description: Yep. You read that right. My classmates just outed me as trans. I got mocked (duh, where I’m at is kinda homophobic). Life is great.

item.title: Better day
item.description: I’m just glad today is better. Thank God for little things.
